alert.note: Alert for Lower Iberia; Lower Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 9:42PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL IBERIA AND SOUTHEASTERN VERMILION PARISHES THROUGH 1015 PM CDT... At 942 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intracoastal City, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Intracoastal City and Esther. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
